description: One memory from this shoot stands out in particular. Alexa was wrapped so tight as to be completely immobilized in a latex cocoon. She was laying on her back on a box and her nose was chained down to the floor with a painful septum clamp. She couldn't move her head at all without her eyes welling up with tears from putting additional tension on the clamp. All things considered, it seemed like a great moment to start slowly ripping off the tiny serrated clamps that were affixed to her nipples once by one. Her muscles started shaking and her eyes went back and forth, back and forth like a wide-eyed cat cookoo clock from some silent 1950's black and white animation.
title: Cocoon
